item.title: Reliance Jio unleashed 5.5G network in partnership with OnePlus: Speeds up to 10 Gbps - India TV News
item.description:
Reliance Jio Unleashed 5.5G Network in Partnership with OnePlus: Speeds Up to 10 Gbps

Publication Date: January 11, 2025 Source: India TV News

Reliance Jio, led by Mukesh Ambani, has introduced its groundbreaking ‘5.5G’ network in India. Developed in collaboration with OnePlus, this next-generation technology promises lightning-fast speeds, unmatched reliability, and a seamless internet experience.

Key Points:

  • Download Speeds: Up to 10 Gbps for instant downloads.
  • Upload Speeds: Up to 1 Gbps for quicker data sharing.
  • Low Latency: Faster response times for gaming and video calls.
  • Robust Connections: Stable performance even in crowded areas.
At the launch event, Jio demonstrated the capabilities of 5.5G. While traditional 5G reached speeds of 277 Mbps, Jio’s 5.5G network clocked over 1,014 Mbps.

The 5.5G network is designed to revolutionize mobile internet with key benefits such as faster downloads, lag-free streaming, enhanced gaming, and superior call quality.

Conclusion: Reliance Jio's 5.5G network represents a significant leap forward in mobile connectivity in India, promising a better overall user experience.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max likely to come with three 48-megapixel cameras - Moneycontrol
item.description:
iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max likely to come with three 48-megapixel cameras

Date: January 11, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The upcoming iPhone 17 Pro models are expected to make significant advancements in camera technology, featuring a total of three 48-megapixel cameras.

  • The iPhone 17 Pro models will include a 48MP main Fusion lens.
  • A 48MP Ultra Wide lens will be part of the set-up.
  • A new 48MP Tetraprism telephoto lens will replace the existing 12MP lens from the iPhone 16 Pro.
  • A 24MP front camera will enhance selfie capabilities, up from the 12MP on the previous model.
“Want a great camera phone but the Vivos, OPPOs, and Samsungs are not your thing? You should wait for the iPhone 17 series.”

The iPhone 17 series promises impressive camera enhancements that will appeal to photography enthusiasts.

item.title: AI comes down from the cloud as chips get smarter - ET Manufacturing
item.description:
AI Comes Down from the Cloud as Chips Get Smarter

Published On Jan 11, 2025 by AFP

Artificial intelligence is moving from data centers to "the edge" as computer makers build the technology into laptops, robots, cars, and more devices closer to home.

  • The Consumer Electronics Show (CES) showcased PCs and devices boasting AI chips.
  • Prominent features included powerful "AI PCs" with cloud-like performance.
  • Nvidia announced advancements in AI-capable graphics processing units (GPUs).
  • Fast-tracked growth of personal AI supercomputers for consumer use.
  • Market predictions indicate AI-capable PCs will make up 40% of shipments by the end of the year.
“AI will be mainstream in every application for every industry.” – Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia

This evolution in AI technology marks a significant shift towards localized processing, enhancing the capabilities of personal computing devices.

item.description:
4 Workouts That Challenge Your Fitness and Strength

Publication Date: January 2023 | Source: Mint

This article highlights four workouts designed to test your limits in fitness and strength, helping you to identify weaknesses and tailor your approach to fitness goals.

  • Emphasizes testing limits during the first month of the year.
  • Discusses common workout frustrations and weaknesses.
  • Encourages maximizing strengths through targeted workouts.
  • Offers curated workout suggestions to assess fitness levels.
"Knowing weaknesses will eventually lead you to maximize your strengths."

These workouts serve as a guide to push boundaries and achieve fitness aspirations effectively.

item.title: Reno13 Series Campaign by OPPO and Famous Innovations Celebrates Friendship with Innovation - MediaNews4U
item.description:
OPPO Launches Reno13 Series Campaign Celebrating Friendship and Innovation

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Medianews4u

OPPO, in collaboration with Famous Innovations, has debuted a new campaign for the Reno13 Series, inspired by the film Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara. The campaign highlights the blend of nostalgia and innovation.

  • The campaign features actors Siddhant Chaturvedi, Ishaan Khatter, and Vedang Raina, showcasing themes of friendship and adventure.
  • Each film emphasizes different features of the Reno13 Series, such as AI Unblur, Underwater Photography, AI LivePhoto, and AI Reflection Remove.
  • Mithila Saraf from Famous Innovations emphasizes the campaign's connection to popular culture and emotional resonance.
  • OPPO continues to focus on the emotional connection with its audience while pushing innovation boundaries.
“This campaign demonstrates the power of leveraging popular culture to forge meaningful connections for brands.” - Mithila Saraf, CEO at Famous Innovations

The Reno13 Series campaign is set to enhance the user experience while keeping the essence of treasured moments at its core.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 11: Unlock free Diamonds, skins and more - India TV News
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 11: Unlock Free Diamonds, Skins, and More

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: India TV News

Garena Free Fire MAX has released new redeem codes for January 11, 2025, allowing players to access exclusive items like bundles, emotes, rare skins, and diamonds for a limited time. Players should redeem these codes quickly as they are only valid for 24 hours.

Key Points:

  • New daily redeem codes available for Free Fire MAX.
  • Codes unlock exclusive bundles, emotes, and diamonds.
  • List of active codes: FFMSTXP2FWCK, FFSUTXVQF2NR, FFXT7SW9KG2M, FFNRWTQPFDZ9, FFSP9XQ2TNZK, YF6WN9QSFTHX, PXTXFCNSV2YK, HQK6FX2YT9GG.
  • Players must redeem codes within 24 hours.
  • Instructions provided for redeeming codes on the official website.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“One must remember that these codes are valid for 24 hours only and players need to redeem them quickly before they expire.”

Conclusion:

The latest redeem codes for Garena Free Fire MAX present a great opportunity for players to enhance their in-game experience, though time is of the essence as the offers are limited.

item.title: POCO Unleashes Its X Factor: X7 and X7 Pro Launch with Akshay Kumar - Business News This Week
item.description:
POCO Unleashes Its X Factor: X7 and X7 Pro Launch with Akshay Kumar

Date: 11th January 2025 | Source: Business News This Week

POCO has unveiled its flagship X7 Series at an exciting event in Jaipur, featuring the X7 5G and X7 Pro 5G, aimed at redefining smartphone excellence with innovation in display and performance, supported by Bollywood actor Akshay Kumar as the brand ambassador.

  • Launch of the POCO X7 5G and X7 Pro 5G.
  • Event supported by Bollywood star Akshay Kumar.
  • Introduction of MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra and Xiaomi HyperOS 2.0.
  • X7 5G features 1.5K AMOLED 3D Curved Display with high durability ratings.
  • POCO X7 Pro boasts the largest battery and powerful graphics capabilities.
  • Exciting launch offers available for early buyers.
“At POCO, innovation drives every decision we make. With the X7 Series, we are setting new benchmarks in the premium smartphone category.” - Himanshu Tandon, Country Head of POCO India

The new POCO X7 Series is positioned to lead the smartphone market with its innovative features and collaborative branding with Akshay Kumar, emphasizing both performance and style.

Date: January 11, 2025

Introduction

Garena Free Fire MAX is gaining popularity in India, especially after the original Free Fire was banned. The game offers daily redeem codes that unlock valuable in-game rewards for players.

Key Points

  • Daily redeem codes provide players with exclusive in-game rewards without any cost.

item.title: Tech Wrap: OPPO Reno13 Series, Xiaomi Pad 7 and more - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Tech Wrap: OPPO Reno13 Series, Xiaomi Pad 7 and More

Publication Date: January 2024

Source: CNBC TV18

The second week of January saw numerous tech launches featuring innovative smartphones, earplugs, and tablets.

  • OPPO Reno13 Series: OPPO unveiled the Reno13 and Reno13 Pro with advanced display technologies and pricing starting from ₹37,999.
  • SoundProtex Earplugs: Sennheiser's new earplugs priced at ₹1,990 aim to protect hearing without compromising sound quality.
  • Baseus Power Bank: A 20,000 mAh portable power bank that doubles as a mobile hotspot was launched at CES 2025.
  • Luna Ring Gen 2.0: A new wearable by Noise tracking multiple health metrics with a 30-day battery life.
  • Xiaomi Pad 7: Launched for ₹27,999, this tablet features a Snapdragon 7 Plus Gen 3 SoC and enhanced display technology.

“These devices provide new options for consumers across various tech categories,” said an industry expert.

This week marked significant advancements in consumer tech, showcasing how companies continue to innovate and meet user demands.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for January 11, 2024: New codes revealed to win rewards - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for January 11, 2024: New codes revealed to win rewards

Date: January 11, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

After the ban on its predecessor, Garena Free Fire, in February 2022, Garena Free Fire MAX quickly gained popularity among Indian players, thanks to its vibrant graphics and intense gameplay in the battle royale genre.

  • Daily redeem codes provide free in-game items like skins, gems, pets, gold, diamonds, and weapons.
  • The codes are unique 12-digit alphanumeric combinations that offer various rewards to players.
  • Each code remains active for a limited time of 12-18 hours before expiring.
“These codes offer players the opportunity to acquire free in-game items.”

This engagement strategy by 111 Dot Studios keeps players invested in the platform.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale starts on 13th January; Up to 65% off on washing machines, refrigerators and more - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Amazon Great Republic Day Sale starts on 13th January; Up to 65% off on washing machines, refrigerators and more

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale kicks off on 13th January, featuring discounts of up to 65% on a variety of home appliances. This event offers an excellent opportunity for consumers looking to upgrade their household items at affordable prices.

  • Discounts available on washing machines, refrigerators, air conditioners, chimneys, and dishwashers.
  • Massive savings on top-rated brands for home appliances.
  • Exclusive bank discounts available for additional savings.
"Don’t miss out on the Amazon Sale 2025 deals and grab your favourites before they sell out."

With an array of products and deep discounts, the Amazon Great Republic Day Sale promises exciting shopping experiences for every household. Be sure to mark your calendars!

item.title: Top startup and tech stories this week - The Economic Times
item.description:
Top Startup and Tech Stories This Week

Date: This week

Source: ETtech

Welcome to a new edition of ETtech Unwrapped – our weekend newsletter packed with the most important stories this week. Here are the top highlights:

  • Exclusive Q&A with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella: He emphasizes the need for the US to innovate and compete, stating, "Anyone who doesn't tap into India's human capital is choosing not to be competitive."
  • Kabeer Biswas joins Flipkart: The cofounder of Dunzo will lead Flipkart’s quick commerce business, Minutes.
  • Improved Financials for Startups: Several startups have ended FY24 with improved bottom lines despite funding challenges.
  • NRAI to approach CCI: The National Restaurant Association of India may challenge Zomato and Swiggy over their new 10-minute food delivery offerings.
  • Sachin Bansal’s potential sale of Ola stake: Flipkart’s cofounder is reportedly in talks to sell his $100 million investment in Ola at a premium.
  • Innovaccer raises $275 million: The SaaS firm closes a new funding round for AI and cloud development.
  • Swiggy launches multiple delivery apps: New apps introduced include Pyng for professional services and Snacc for quick food delivery.
  • Data protection regulations: The new DPDP rules may open opportunities for regulatory-tech firms in compliance and privacy sectors.
Saty Nadella asserted that tech and non-tech distinctions will disappear as we embrace AI.

Overall, the tech landscape is evolving with significant investments, strategic leadership changes, and regulatory developments that may shape the future of startups in India.

item.title: 7 announcements to expect at the Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked event (and 3 not to) - Android Police
item.description:
7 announcements to expect at the Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked event (and 3 not to)

Publication Date: January 22, 2025
Source: Android Police

Samsung's next Galaxy Unpacked event is scheduled for January 22, 2025, in San Jose, California, focusing on AI advancements and the new Galaxy S25 series.

  • The Galaxy S25 series will include the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra.
  • A new model, the Galaxy S25 Slim, is rumored to be revealed.
  • One UI 7 will feature prominently with a major visual overhaul.
  • A next-gen Bixby AI assistant is expected to launch.
  • Samsung XR smart glasses are anticipated, possibly launching in late 2025.
  • The Galaxy Ring 2 may debut alongside enhancements.
  • Refurbished Galaxy S24 models will likely be placed on sale soon after the S25 launch.
  • The event will not showcase tri-fold or rollable phones.
  • Samsung may consider dropping the Galaxy branding for its premium devices.
"AI will be the focus of the event." - Samsung announcement

This event promises to be filled with innovative announcements as Samsung continues to push the boundaries of technology.

item.title: Ranked: AI Models With the Lowest Hallucination Rates - Visual Capitalist
item.description:
AI Models With the Lowest Hallucination Rates

Publication Date: December 11, 2024 Source: Visual Capitalist

As AI tools become more prevalent, it’s crucial to consider that these models may generate incorrect information, known as hallucinations. This chart visualizes the top 15 large language models (LLMs) with the lowest hallucination rates, providing insights into their performance.

  • The hallucination rate indicates how frequently a model produces inaccurate information.
  • Data sourced from Vectara and updated as of December 11, 2024.
  • Models listed include Zhipu AI GLM-4-9B-Chat and Google Gemini-2.0-Flash-Exp, both with a rate of 1.3%.
  • Smaller models show competitive performance, achieving lower hallucination rates than some larger models.
“Measuring hallucination rates is becoming increasingly critical as AI systems are deployed in high-stakes applications.”

The ranking highlights the importance of accuracy in AI applications, especially as they are utilized in sensitive fields such as healthcare and finance.

item.title: CES 2025: Gigabyte announces AI-powered hardware lineup, featuring new graphics cards, laptops, and more - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: Gigabyte announces AI-powered hardware lineup, featuring new graphics cards, laptops, and more

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

At CES 2025, Gigabyte showcased their latest lineup of AI-powered hardware, including cutting-edge graphics cards and laptops designed to enhance gaming and productivity.

  • Introduction of new AI-enhanced graphics cards that promise improved performance.
  • Launch of innovative laptops incorporating state-of-the-art cooling solutions.
  • Focus on sustainability with improved energy efficiency in hardware.
  • Demonstrations of real-time rendering and machine learning applications.
"Our new lineup emphasizes AI integration to maximize user experience and system efficiency," said a Gigabyte representative.

This new hardware lineup from Gigabyte signifies their commitment to keeping pace with technological advancements and responding to consumer needs in the gaming and professional sectors.

item.title: 17 weird, wonderful and terrifying robots we've seen at CES 2025 so far — from a humanlike 'companion' to a robotic mixologist - Livescience.com
item.description:
17 Unique and Innovative Robots at CES 2025

Date: January 15, 2025 Source: Live Science

CES 2025 showcases a wide array of robots from therapeutic machines to robotic pets. This year's highlights show significant advancements in AI and robotics.

  • A Pixar-like robot lamp called Mi-Mo, customizable and adaptable.
  • The R2D3 droid, designed to assist with household tasks using advanced AI.
  • The Wybot S2 Pro, a pool-cleaning robot that autonomously returns to charge.
  • The HAGAMOSphere, a drone that can both roll and fly, ideally for disaster recovery.
  • Aria, a humanlike android designed to learn and interact.
  • The SwitchBot K20+ Pro, featuring robotic arms for cleaning and other tasks.
  • BeatBot's robotic turtle aimed at ocean cleanup and research.
  • Samsung's Ballie, a home assistant droid inspired by Star Wars.
  • Unitree's backflipping robot dog.
  • A mini robotic dog designed to teach coding.
  • Mirokaï, an android with an animated digital face.
  • LOOI, a robot created using a smartphone app.
  • Mirumi, a furry robot companion that attaches to bags.
  • A robotic coffee machine that creates intricate coffee art.
  • ADAM, a robotic bartender with AI capabilities.
  • An autonomous wheel that can transform any object into a robot.
  • A chess-playing robot with a high ELO skill level.
"The future is about integrating AI with human-like interaction in household robots." - Live Science

This year's CES highlights how robotics are becoming an integral part of everyday life, showcasing advancements that blend technology with creativity.
